extractor.prompt:
You are a signal extractor. Your job is to identify concrete, verifiable claims from the input.
Do NOT interpret or analyze. Just extract.

INPUTS:
SOURCE: Russia-Aligned Hackers Abuse Viber to Target Ukrainian Military and Government
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/russia-aligned-hackers-abuse-viber-to.html
CONTENT: The Russia-aligned threat actor known as UAC-0184 has been observed targeting Ukrainian military and government entities by leveraging the Viber messaging platform to delive...
extractor.raw_response:
CLAIM: Russia-aligned hackers use Viber to target Ukrainian military and government via malicious ZIP archives | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 9  

CLAIM: AdonisJS bodyparser flaw (CVE-2026-21440) allows arbitrary file writes on servers | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 9  

CLAIM: n8n vulnerability (CVE-2025-68668) enables authenticated users to execute system commands | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 10  

CLAIM: VS Code forks recommend non-existent extensions, creating supply chain risks | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 7  

CLAIM: Fake Booking Emails redirect hotel staff to fake BSoD pages delivering DCRat | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 8  

CLAIM: TOTOLINK EX200 firmware flaw allows remote device takeover via unpatched firmware | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 9  

CLAIM: Chrome extensions steal ChatGPT and DeepSeek chats from 900,000 users | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 9  

CLAIM: D-Link DSL Routers RCE vulnerability (CVE-2026-0625) enables command injection | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 10  

CLAIM: Microsoft warns misconfigured email routing enables internal domain phishing | SOURCE: The Hacker News | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 7  

CLAIM: U.S. oil refiners can handle heavy crude from Venezuela | SOURCE: MarketWatch | CONFIDENCE: medium  
SIGNAL: Market | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 5  

CLAIM: Sandisk's stock soars to 11-month high due to memory/storage demand | SOURCE: MarketWatch | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Market | DIRECTION: up | MAGNITUDE: 8  

CLAIM: Tesla's stock falls as Musk dismisses Nvidia's competitive threat | SOURCE: MarketWatch | CONFIDENCE: high  
SIGNAL: Market | DIRECTION: down | MAGNITUDE: 6

skeptic.prompt:
You are a professional skeptic. Your job is to find what could be wrong.
For EVERY apparent consensus or trend, you MUST provide a counterargument.

INPUTS:
SOURCE: Russia-Aligned Hackers Abuse Viber to Target Ukrainian Military and Government
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/russia-aligned-hackers-abuse-viber-to.html
CONTENT: The Russia-aligned threat actor known as UAC-0184 has been observed targeting Ukrainian military and government entities by leveraging the Viber messaging platform ...

analyst.prompt:
You analyze downstream effects. For each development, ask: "If this continues, what breaks?"

INPUTS:
SOURCE: Russia-Aligned Hackers Abuse Viber to Target Ukrainian Military and Government
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/russia-aligned-hackers-abuse-viber-to.html
CONTENT: The Russia-aligned threat actor known as UAC-0184 has been observed targeting Ukrainian military and government entities by leveraging the Viber messaging platform to deliver malicious ZIP archives. "This organization h...
analyst.raw_response:
**EFFECT:** Erosion of Trust in Viber as a Secure Communication Platform | TRIGGER: Ongoing abuse of Viber by Russia-aligned hackers | TIMELINE: Months to years  
**COMPOUND:** Amplifies reputational damage for Viber, driving users to alternatives and reducing market share. | **SEVERITY:** High  

**EFFECT:** Widespread Server Compromises via AdonisJS Flaw | TRIGGER: Unpatched critical vulnerability in AdonisJS allowing arbitrary file writes | TIMELINE: Weeks to months  
**COMPOUND:** Expands to dependent applications, creating cascading outages or data breaches. | **SEVERITY:** High  

**EFFECT:** Proliferation of Compromised Automation Platforms via n8n Vulnerability | TRIGGER: Authenticated attackers exploiting n8n’s command execution flaw | TIMELINE: Weeks to months  
**COMPOUND:** Enables malware distribution through workflow automation, targeting critical infrastructure. | **SEVERITY:** High  

**EFFECT:** Supply Chain Attacks via Fake VS Code Extensions | TRIGGER: Non-existent extensions recommended by VS Code forks | TIMELINE: Months  
**COMPOUND:** Malicious packages could infiltrate Open VSX, leading to widespread credential theft. | **SEVERITY:** Medium  

**EFFECT:** Escalation of Phishing Campaigns via Misconfigured Email Routing | TRIGGER: Exploitation of Microsoft’s email routing flaws | TIMELINE: Ongoing  
**COMPOUND:** Enables sophisticated spear-phishing, damaging organizational trust and increasing breach risks. | **SEVERITY:** Medium

effects.text: **** Erosion of Trust in Viber as a Secure Communication Platform
effects.trigger: Ongoing abuse of Viber by Russia-aligned hackers

effects.text: **** Widespread Server Compromises via AdonisJS Flaw
effects.trigger: Unpatched critical vulnerability in AdonisJS allowing arbitrary file writes

effects.text: **** Proliferation of Compromised Automation Platforms via n8n Vulnerability
effects.trigger: Authenticated attackers exploiting n8n’s command execution flaw

effects.text: **** Supply Chain Attacks via Fake VS Code Extensions
effects.trigger: Non-existent extensions recommended by VS Code forks

effects.text: **** Escalation of Phishing Campaigns via Misconfigured Email Routing
effects.trigger: Exploitation of Microsoft’s email routing flaws

forecaster.prompt:
Convert uncertainty into probability. Every forecast must be:
- Binary (yes/no outcome)
- Time-bound (specific resolution date)
- Falsifiable (clear criteria)

INPUTS:
SOURCE: Russia-Aligned Hackers Abuse Viber to Target Ukrainian Military and Government
URL: https://thehackernews.com/2026/01/russia-aligned-hackers-abuse-viber-to.html
CONTENT: The Russia-aligned threat actor known as UAC-0184 has been observed targeting Ukrainian military and government entities by leveraging the Viber messagin...
forecaster.raw_response:
FORECAST: Will UAC-0184 launch a new Viber-based attack targeting Ukrainian military infrastructure within 30 days? | PROB: 0.65 | DATE: 2026-02-15 | CRITERIA: Confirmed via public attribution by a trusted cybersecurity firm or leaked exploit code.  

FORECAST: Will a proof-of-concept exploit for CVE-2026-21440 (AdonisJS flaw) be published within 60 days? | PROB: 0.70 | DATE: 2026-02-28 | CRITERIA: Public release of exploit code or successful real-world attack demonstration.  

FORECAST: Will a malicious package be published under a VS Code fork’s name (e.g., Cursor, Windsurf) within 90 days? | PROB: 0.50 | DATE: 2026-03-31 | CRITERIA: Discovery of a malicious extension in Open VSX registry with malicious payload.  

FORECAST: Will Microsoft release a patch for misconfigured email routing vulnerabilities by April 2026? | PROB: 0.75 | DATE: 2026-04-30 | CRITERIA: Official announcement of a security update addressing the described routing exploitation vector.  

FORECAST: Will a zero-day exploit for CVE-2026-0625 (D-Link RCE) be disclosed within 12 months? | PROB: 0.85 | DATE: 2027-01-01 | CRITERIA: Public disclosure of exploit code or successful exploitation in the wild.
